author: marioevz
content:
Please take a look into the breaking changes for the consumption of the included fixtures!
The format has been change to take into account the specification changes in EIP-7685, more details in the release notes, but let me know if you need extra info.

author: lightclient
content:
i think these should say `if block_body_override is not None`

https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/blob/397c21a26653cb924ce4638d0a906c7686fd01da/tests/prague/eip7002_el_triggerable_withdrawals/test_withdrawal_requests.py#L722
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/blob/397c21a26653cb924ce4638d0a906c7686fd01da/tests/prague/eip7251_consolidations/test_consolidations.py#L773

otherwise it will not put the override header and there we'll accept the block as the `requestsHash` is correct
